remarks: The category formed by structure restriction is the same as the category restriction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fullsubc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
fullsubc.h $e |- H = ( Homf ` C ) $.
fullsubc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
fullsubc.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
fullsubc.d $e |- D = ( C |`s S ) $.
fullsubc.e $e |- E = ( C |`cat ( H |` ( S X. S ) ) ) $.
fullresc $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Homf ` D ) = ( Homf ` E ) /\ ( comf ` D ) = ( comf ` E ) ) ) $.
